shout,"},{"lineNumber":174013,"originalJapaneseLine":"言葉も空気も一瞬だけ全て消し飛ばした。","translatedEnglishLine":"blew away all words and atmosphere for a moment."},{"lineNumber":174014,"originalJapaneseLine":"「本当にあいつ弱いんだろうな？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That guy really is weak, isn't he?\""},{"lineNumber":174015,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そのはずです……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"He should be...\""},{"lineNumber":174016,"originalJapaneseLine":"「何故、庇うか……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Why protect him...?"},{"lineNumber":174017,"originalJapaneseLine":"　まだ分からんか……」","translatedEnglishLine":"Can't you understand yet...?"},{"lineNumber":174018,"originalJapaneseLine":"「まあ、元々強いお前らには分かるまいな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, you who have always been strong wouldn't understand."},{"lineNumber":174019,"originalJapaneseLine":"　かく言う、昔の儂にも分からなかったろう」","translatedEnglishLine":"Even I, in my younger days, probably didn't understand either.\""},{"lineNumber":174020,"originalJapaneseLine":"「カオスマスターの夢はハーレムと","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Chaos Master's dream is a harem,"},{"lineNumber":174021,"originalJapaneseLine":"　先ほど言っていたな……」","translatedEnglishLine":"you said just a moment ago...\""},{"lineNumber":174022,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂にも夢――野望がある。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I too have a dream—a desire."},{"lineNumber":174023,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは世界最強……」","translatedEnglishLine":"It is to be the strongest in the world...\""},{"lineNumber":174024,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ふふふ、老骨が何をと笑うかね？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hahaha, what do you laugh at an old bone like me for?\""},{"lineNumber":174025,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だが、男なら誰でも憧れるだろう？」","translatedEnglishLine":"But any man would yearn for that, wouldn't he?"},{"lineNumber":174026,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂はこの最弱の身となって","translatedEnglishLine":"Now that I have become this weakest of beings,"},{"lineNumber":174027,"originalJapaneseLine":"　一つだけ分かったことがある」","translatedEnglishLine":"there is one thing I've come to understand."},{"lineNumber":174028,"originalJapaneseLine":"「最初から持ちうる強さになど大した価値はない。","translatedEnglishLine":"The strength one is born with is of little value."},{"lineNumber":174029,"originalJapaneseLine":"　弱い身なれどただ愚直に己を鍛え続けられる、","translatedEnglishLine":"Rather, it's the heart to persistently and earnestly train oneself, even if weak,"},{"lineNumber":174030,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その心の強さこそが最も価値あるのだと」","translatedEnglishLine":"that mental strength which is the most precious.\""},{"lineNumber":174031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「リトルプリンセスが魔王だと？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The Little Princess is the Demon King?\""},{"lineNumber":174032,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿を言ってはいけない。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Don't be foolish."},{"lineNumber":174033,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ぽっと出の力を得た者に誰が従えるか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Who would follow someone who just suddenly gained power?\""},{"lineNumber":174034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「頭-ｺｳﾍﾞ-を垂れるなら、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"If you bow your head,"},{"lineNumber":174035,"originalJapaneseLine":"　それは誰よりも強い者にでありたい」","translatedEnglishLine":"then you want to bow to the strongest of all.\""},{"lineNumber":174036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「それがケイブリスだってのか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"So that is what Cavebris is?\""},{"lineNumber":174037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「左様」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Exactly.\""},{"lineNumber":174038,"originalJapaneseLine":"それは、派閥戦争の直後――","translatedEnglishLine":"That was right after the faction war—"},{"lineNumber":174039,"originalJapaneseLine":"最強の魔物の身から、王剣フサフサ丸の力で","translatedEnglishLine":"from the strongest demon to the weakest demon by the power of the royal sword Fusafusa-maru."},{"lineNumber":174040,"originalJapaneseLine":"最弱の魔物に転落してすぐのこと。","translatedEnglishLine":"It was just after falling to the weakest demon."},{"lineNumber":174041,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界の全てが恐ろしくて仕方なく見え、","translatedEnglishLine":"The whole world looked terrifying beyond measure,"},{"lineNumber":174042,"originalJapaneseLine":"恐怖に震えあなぐらに引きこもっていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and I trembled in fear, hiding away in a hole."},{"lineNumber":174043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gwahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":174044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　ようやく見つけたぞぉ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"I've finally found you!\""},{"lineNumber":174045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ひっ！？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Eek!?\""},{"lineNumber":174046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いよう！　いい格好だな、ストロガノフ！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey there! Looking good, Stroganoff!\""},{"lineNumber":174047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……あ、ああ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Ah, yeah.\""},{"lineNumber":174048,"originalJapaneseLine":"そのとき、ストロガノフは理解した。","translatedEnglishLine":"At that moment, Stroganoff understood."},{"lineNumber":174049,"originalJapaneseLine":"目の前にいるこの男は、","translatedEnglishLine":"This man before him,"},{"lineNumber":174050,"originalJapaneseLine":"今の自分と同じ身から這い上がった男なのだと。","translatedEnglishLine":"was a man who had climbed up from the same state as himself."},{"lineNumber":174051,"originalJapaneseLine":"世界最強になる、そんな野望を","translatedEnglishLine":"The ambition to become the strongest in the world,"},{"lineNumber":174052,"originalJapaneseLine":"六千年も変わらずに持ち続けた大馬鹿者――","translatedEnglishLine":"a great fool who held onto that ambition unchanged for six thousand years—"},{"lineNumber":174053,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界の他のどこに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Where else in this world,"},{"lineNumber":174054,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼ほど堪え忍んだ者がいるだろうか――","translatedEnglishLine":"is there anyone who has endured as much as he has—"},{"lineNumber":174055,"originalJapaneseLine":"この世界の他のどこに、","translatedEnglishLine":"Where else in this world,"},{"lineNumber":174056,"originalJapaneseLine":"彼以上に強い者がいるだろうか――","translatedEnglishLine":"is there anyone stronger than him—"},{"lineNumber":174057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂は……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I..."},{"lineNumber":174058,"originalJapaneseLine":"　彼が報われるところが見たいと思った」","translatedEnglishLine":"wanted to see him receive his due reward.\""},{"lineNumber":174059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……報われなければならぬ方だと思った」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...I believed he was someone who must be rewarded.\""},{"lineNumber":174060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「だから儂は今この場にいる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's why I am here now.\""},{"lineNumber":174061,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフが王剣フサフサ丸を掴む。","translatedEnglishLine":"Stroganoff grasps the royal sword Fusafusa-maru."},{"lineNumber":174062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂もまた強さに惹かれたのよ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I was also drawn to strength.\""},{"lineNumber":174063,"originalJapaneseLine":"フサフサ丸が引き抜かれ、傷口から光が漏れ出す。","translatedEnglishLine":"Fusafusa-maru is drawn out, light leaking from the wound."},{"lineNumber":174064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「魔物として……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"As a demon..."},{"lineNumber":174065,"originalJapaneseLine":"　なにより、こんな老骨の身でも尚――」","translatedEnglishLine":"more than anything, even in this old, frail body—\""},{"lineNumber":174066,"originalJapaneseLine":"「儂も男だからな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'm still a man!\""},{"lineNumber":174067,"originalJapaneseLine":"ストロガノフが遂に王剣フサフサ丸を","translatedEnglishLine":"Stroganoff finally pulled out the royal sword Fusafusa-maru."},{"lineNumber":174068,"originalJapaneseLine":"抜き放った。","translatedEnglishLine":"He unsheathed it."},{"lineNumber":174069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿なことを……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Such a foolish thing..."},{"lineNumber":174070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その剣を抜けば力は取り戻せます……","translatedEnglishLine":"If you pull out that sword, you can regain your strength...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Dwah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフの一喝が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff's shout,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉も空気も一瞬だけ全て消し飛ばした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: blew away all words and atmosphere for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当にあいつ弱いんだろうな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy really is weak, isn't he?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのはずです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He should be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故、庇うか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why protect him...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ分からんか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't you understand yet...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、元々強いお前らには分かるまいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you who have always been strong wouldn't understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かく言う、昔の儂にも分からなかったろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I, in my younger days, probably didn't understand either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスマスターの夢はハーレムと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Chaos Master's dream is a harem,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先ほど言っていたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you said just a moment ago..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂にも夢――野望がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I too have a dream—a desire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは世界最強……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is to be the strongest in the world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふ、老骨が何をと笑うかね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, what do you laugh at an old bone like me for?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、男なら誰でも憧れるだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But any man would yearn for that, wouldn't he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂はこの最弱の身となって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that I have become this weakest of beings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つだけ分かったことがある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is one thing I've come to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初から持ちうる強さになど大した価値はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strength one is born with is of little value.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱い身なれどただ愚直に己を鍛え続けられる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, it's the heart to persistently and earnestly train oneself, even if weak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その心の強さこそが最も価値あるのだと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that mental strength which is the most precious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リトルプリンセスが魔王だと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Little Princess is the Demon King?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿を言ってはいけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't be foolish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽっと出の力を得た者に誰が従えるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who would follow someone who just suddenly gained power?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頭-ｺｳﾍﾞ-を垂れるなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you bow your head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは誰よりも強い者にでありたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then you want to bow to the strongest of all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがケイブリスだってのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So that is what Cavebris is?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、派閥戦争の直後――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was right after the faction war—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最強の魔物の身から、王剣フサフサ丸の力で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from the strongest demon to the weakest demon by the power of the royal sword Fusafusa-maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最弱の魔物に転落してすぐのこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just after falling to the weakest demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の全てが恐ろしくて仕方なく見え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The whole world looked terrifying beyond measure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐怖に震えあなぐらに引きこもっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I trembled in fear, hiding away in a hole.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく見つけたぞぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've finally found you!"
"Eek!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いよう！　いい格好だな、ストロガノフ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey there! Looking good, Stroganoff!"
"...Ah, yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、ストロガノフは理解した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Stroganoff understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前にいるこの男は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This man before him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の自分と同じ身から這い上がった男なのだと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was a man who had climbed up from the same state as himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最強になる、そんな野望を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ambition to become the strongest in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 六千年も変わらずに持ち続けた大馬鹿者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a great fool who held onto that ambition unchanged for six thousand years—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の他のどこに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where else in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼ほど堪え忍んだ者がいるだろうか――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is there anyone who has endured as much as he has—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の他のどこに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where else in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼以上に強い者がいるだろうか――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is there anyone stronger than him—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂は……
彼が報われるところが見たいと思った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wanted to see him receive his due reward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……報われなければならぬ方だと思った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I believed he was someone who must be rewarded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから儂は今この場にいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I am here now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが王剣フサフサ丸を掴む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff grasps the royal sword Fusafusa-maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂もまた強さに惹かれたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was also drawn to strength."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フサフサ丸が引き抜かれ、傷口から光が漏れ出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fusafusa-maru is drawn out, light leaking from the wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物として……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As a demon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにより、こんな老骨の身でも尚――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: more than anything, even in this old, frail body—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂も男だからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm still a man!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが遂に王剣フサフサ丸を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff finally pulled out the royal sword Fusafusa-maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抜き放った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He unsheathed it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿なことを……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a foolish thing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その剣を抜けば力は取り戻せます……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you pull out that sword, you can regain your strength..."

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

it."},{"lineNumber":174069,"originalJapaneseLine":"「馬鹿なことを……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Such a foolish thing..."},{"lineNumber":174070,"originalJapaneseLine":"　その剣を抜けば力は取り戻せます……","translatedEnglishLine":"If you pull out that sword, you can regain your strength...\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どわっ！？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Dwah!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフの一喝が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff's shout,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 言葉も空気も一瞬だけ全て消し飛ばした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: blew away all words and atmosphere for a moment.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「本当にあいつ弱いんだろうな？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That guy really is weak, isn't he?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そのはずです……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "He should be..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何故、庇うか……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Why protect him...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まだ分からんか……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Can't you understand yet...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「まあ、元々強いお前らには分かるまいな。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Well, you who have always been strong wouldn't understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: かく言う、昔の儂にも分からなかったろう」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Even I, in my younger days, probably didn't understand either."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「カオスマスターの夢はハーレムと
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Chaos Master's dream is a harem,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 先ほど言っていたな……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: you said just a moment ago..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂にも夢――野望がある。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I too have a dream—a desire.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは世界最強……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It is to be the strongest in the world..."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふふふ、老骨が何をと笑うかね？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hahaha, what do you laugh at an old bone like me for?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だが、男なら誰でも憧れるだろう？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: But any man would yearn for that, wouldn't he?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂はこの最弱の身となって
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now that I have become this weakest of beings,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 一つだけ分かったことがある」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there is one thing I've come to understand.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「最初から持ちうる強さになど大した価値はない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The strength one is born with is of little value.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 弱い身なれどただ愚直に己を鍛え続けられる、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rather, it's the heart to persistently and earnestly train oneself, even if weak,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その心の強さこそが最も価値あるのだと」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that mental strength which is the most precious."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リトルプリンセスが魔王だと？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "The Little Princess is the Demon King?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿を言ってはいけない。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Don't be foolish.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぽっと出の力を得た者に誰が従えるか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Who would follow someone who just suddenly gained power?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「頭-ｺｳﾍﾞ-を垂れるなら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "If you bow your head,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは誰よりも強い者にでありたい」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: then you want to bow to the strongest of all."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「それがケイブリスだってのか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "So that is what Cavebris is?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「左様」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Exactly."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: それは、派閥戦争の直後――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That was right after the faction war—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最強の魔物の身から、王剣フサフサ丸の力で
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: from the strongest demon to the weakest demon by the power of the royal sword Fusafusa-maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 最弱の魔物に転落してすぐのこと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was just after falling to the weakest demon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界の全てが恐ろしくて仕方なく見え、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The whole world looked terrifying beyond measure,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 恐怖に震えあなぐらに引きこもっていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and I trembled in fear, hiding away in a hole.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ぐぁはぁはぁはぁ！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Gwahahaha!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ようやく見つけたぞぉ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I've finally found you!"
"Eek!?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いよう！　いい格好だな、ストロガノフ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Hey there! Looking good, Stroganoff!"
"...Ah, yeah."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そのとき、ストロガノフは理解した。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At that moment, Stroganoff understood.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目の前にいるこの男は、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This man before him,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今の自分と同じ身から這い上がった男なのだと。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: was a man who had climbed up from the same state as himself.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 世界最強になる、そんな野望を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The ambition to become the strongest in the world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 六千年も変わらずに持ち続けた大馬鹿者――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a great fool who held onto that ambition unchanged for six thousand years—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の他のどこに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where else in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼ほど堪え忍んだ者がいるだろうか――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is there anyone who has endured as much as he has—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: この世界の他のどこに、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Where else in this world,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 彼以上に強い者がいるだろうか――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: is there anyone stronger than him—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂は……
彼が報われるところが見たいと思った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: wanted to see him receive his due reward."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「……報われなければならぬ方だと思った」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "...I believed he was someone who must be rewarded."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「だから儂は今この場にいる」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "That's why I am here now."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが王剣フサフサ丸を掴む。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff grasps the royal sword Fusafusa-maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂もまた強さに惹かれたのよ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I was also drawn to strength."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: フサフサ丸が引き抜かれ、傷口から光が漏れ出す。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fusafusa-maru is drawn out, light leaking from the wound.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「魔物として……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "As a demon...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: なにより、こんな老骨の身でも尚――」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: more than anything, even in this old, frail body—"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「儂も男だからな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "I'm still a man!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ストロガノフが遂に王剣フサフサ丸を
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Stroganoff finally pulled out the royal sword Fusafusa-maru.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 抜き放った。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: He unsheathed it.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「馬鹿なことを……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Such a foolish thing...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: その剣を抜けば力は取り戻せます……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: If you pull out that sword, you can regain your strength..."
